name: Heartbeat (JFox23)
description:
THIS is Heartbeat!

A 2D cooperative splitscreen adventure, focused on two heart halves, that got seperated whilst entering a mysterious dimension, trying to reconnect again. Avoid and destroy (randomly generated) incoming enemies, pick up different power ups, and try to beat your highscore! 

Because this is my first ever project (in this depth), all of your feedback is very much appreciated to better myself and the project for the future - So if something messes up for you, you got any ideas to better the game, or if you just want to tell me if you liked it in any way,  please let me know!

Thank you for checking out this page :)

Note: The game is still very much in development, with new features (visual and sound effects..), updates and fixes coming in the future.
